channel.title: Visual tracking on Vision4robotics
channel.description: Recent content in Visual tracking on Vision4robotics

item.title: Continuity-Aware Latent Interframe Information Mining for Reliable UAV Tracking
item.description: Overview of the ClimRT tracker.

item.title: SGDViT: Saliency-Guided Dynamic Vision Transformer for UAV Tracking
item.description: Overall comparison of tracking results between baseline (blue) and the proposed saliency-guided dynamic vision Transformer (SGDViT) (red).

item.title: Scale-Aware Siamese Object Tracking for Vision-Based UAM Approaching
item.description: Demonstration of the vision-based UAM approaching system and qualitative comparison.

item.title: Siamese Object Tracking for Vision-Based UAM Approaching with Pairwise Scale-Channel Attention
item.description: An overview of the proposed Siamese tracking with pairwise scale-channel attention (SiamPSA) for UAM approaching.

item.title: Ad2Attack: Adaptive Adversarial Attack on Real-Time UAV Tracking
item.description: Overview of our Ad2Attack pipeline.

item.title: Spatial Reliability Enhanced Correlation Filter: An Efficient Approach for Real-Time UAV Tracking
item.description: The main workflow of the SRECF tracker.

item.title: DarkLighter: Light Up the Darkness for UAV Tracking
item.description: Tracking performance comparison in a typical dark scene with the proposed DarkLighter module activated (in red) or not (in pink).

item.title: SiamAPN++: Siamese Attentional Aggregation Network for Real-Time UAV Tracking
item.description: The overview of the SiamAPN++ tracker.

item.title: ADTrack: Target-Aware Dual Filter Learning for Real-Time Anti-Dark UAV Tracking
item.description: Overall framework of the proposed ADTrack. ADTrack includes 3 stages: pretreatment, training, and detection, which are marked out by boxes in different colors. Dual filters, i.e., context filter and target-focused filter, training and detection follow routes in different colors. It can be seen that the final response shaded noises in context response, which indicates the validity of proposed dual filter.

item.title: Mutation Sensitive Correlation Filter for Real-Time UAV Tracking with Adaptive Hybrid Label
item.description: Tracking procedure of the proposed MSCF tracker. Dashed boxes denote the variables to be solved in the main regression. As MTF in the red box is generated from search region in frame k, it is applied to adjust the altitude value of the cruciform pedestal.

item.title: Online Recommendation-based Convolutional Features for Scale-Aware Visual Tracking
item.description: The overview of SiamAPN tracker. It composes of four subnetworks, i.e., feature extraction network, feature fusion network, anchor proposal network (APN), and muti-classification®ression network.

item.title: Siamese Anchor Proposal Network for High-Speed Aerial Tracking
item.description: The overview of SiamAPN tracker. It composes of four subnetworks, i.e., feature extraction network, feature fusion network, anchor proposal network (APN), and muti-classification®ression network.

item.title: Augmented Memory for Correlation Filters in Real-Time UAV Tracking
item.description: Overall structure of AMCF.

item.title: Intermittent Contextual Learning for Keyfilter-Aware UAV Object Tracking Using Deep Convolutional Feature
item.description: Main work-flow of the KAOT tracker.

item.description: Comparison between discriminative correlation filter (DCF) and the proposed BiCF tracker
